text_orig: 助けたら助けっぱなしはねっだろ―――
text: If you help, you won't be able to keep helping ---
text_deepl: You can't just save someone and leave them there...

text_orig: それにしてもすんげえ剣だなァ
text_deepl: That's a hell of a sword, by the way.
It's more like a steel plate.

text_orig: 重さどのくらいあんの?
オレ旅芸人の一座にそれ以来居たんだけどそれがあの盗賊どもに襲われちゃってさ
text: I've been in the troupe of traveling entertainers ever since, but it was attacked by the bandits.
text_deepl: I've been with a traveling troupe of performers ever since, but those bandits attacked us.

text_orig: キュウカン島のかごにブチこまれるわきかんつ酒瓶に浸けられるわ生きてるのが不思議だよまったく!
text: I'm soaked in a liquor bottle that's stuffed in a basket on myna island. It's strange that I'm alive!
text_deepl: I wonder why I'm still alive when I'm being thrown in a cage on Cukan Island or soaked in a bottle of kikanzu...I wonder why I'm still alive!
